channel.title: The FSB speed
channel.description:
I've been thinking, we have motherboards of an FSB speed of 1Ghz, right? (At least I do), and our CPU speeds are way higher than the FSB speed (3.2GHz), wouldn't the total speed of the entire system have to be 1Ghz, because of the speed at which the data travels?
Correct me if i'm wrong, just thinking.

item.title: The FSB speed
item.dc:creator: @S_ms S!ms
item.description:
@S_ms wrote:

We have the north and south bridge for that

Read full topic
